DataElement.preferredName: With Gender Information Specimen Description java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.:The assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.:Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._A statement or an account describing something._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.:The assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.:Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.

Characteristics of people that are socially constructed, including norms, behaviors, and roles based on sex. As a social construct, gender varies from society to society and can change over time. (Adapted from WHO.)
Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: A statement or an account describing something.

Concepts.definition: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
